comments: Blum\'s a pretty cool professor. Tests weren\'t hard especially if you understand the material and have a good page of notes. Make sure to do all of the homework and learnsmart assignments, as well as go to class for free clicker points that will help your grade in the end. If you like math, you can probably pass this class with minimal effort.

He assigns learnsmarts for every chapter and homework for every chapter. Gives cheat sheets and is overall good! Finance isn\'t easy but with blum it is fine.

Has iClicker quizzes for each chapter, but will sometimes give you all the answers. You have a page of notes for each exam, but don\'t rely on it too much unless you make it really detailed.

comments: Great professor and easy class. Just don\'t skip any quiz or HW and you should be fine to get a good grade. Go to his 7AM lab he goes over HW problems that will be on the tests. 3 tests and final are easy(1page of notes allowed). No need for A+ review! again go to his lab, review the HW, take good notes, and you should be able to get at least a B+

comments: If you have to take BA323, this is the guy to take it with. Blum\'s lectures are straight and to the point, his exams have no "trick" questions, and there is a fair amount of hw. He\'s also pretty hilarious. Go to class (and the "labs"), study, do the hw, and you\'ll pass. Best 8am class I\'ve ever had to take.

comments: this was my favorite class of the semester. 8ams are hard, and the 7am lab is brutal but it\'s so worth it. blum made me want to major/minor in finance - i wish he taught more classes. the best professor i\'ve had the pleasure of meeting thus far! i will miss his lectures. 3 exams, cumulative final, homework, and clicker questions - not bad at all!
